name: State Machine Broke
description:
Controls:

W - Jump

A/D - Move

Left Click - Jam machines. Jammed machines are stuck in their current state and cannot change states or become unjammed.

R - Restart level

Esc - Quit Game

Known issues:

Hovering over a camera does not show the machines it affects; hovering over the camera's vision will show this.

Turrets do not shoot at first while in the "shooting" state - this is intentional to allow you to jam turrets in the shooting state without getting shot yourself, though this may not have been communicated well.

Getting crushed has not been handled.
